question1.question: What is the difference between a 'Coin' and a 'Token' on the site?
question1.answer: A coin is a cryptocurrency that can operate independently. A token is a cryptocurrency that depends on another cryptocurrency as a platform to operate. Check out our blog post for more information.

question2.question: What is Bitcoin (BTC)?
question2.answer: Bitcoin is the first cryptocurrency created in 2009 by Satoshi Nakamoto. It is a decentralized digital currency that can be sent from user to user on the peer-to-peer bitcoin network without the need for intermediaries.

question3.question: What is USDT Coin (USDT)?
question3.answer: Tether (USDT) is a cryptocurrency with a value meant to mirror the value of the U.S. dollar. The idea was to create a stable cryptocurrency that can be used like digital dollars. Coins that serve this purpose of being a stable dollar substitute are called “stable coins.” USDT is the most popular stable coin and even acts as a dollar replacement on many popular exchanges!

question4.question: How can I buy cryptocurrency?
question4.answer: You can buy cryptocurrency on Coingarage by following these three steps: 1. Sign up for a Coingarage account. 2. Verify your account. 3. Deposit EUR or other supported cryptocurrencies. 4. Buy your favorite cryptocurrencies.

question5.question: How can I verify my personal account?
question5.answer: You can verify your personal account by following these three steps: 1. Log in to your Coingarage account. 2. Go to your account settings. 3. Click on the verification tab. 4. Follow the instructions and upload the required documents. 5. Wait for your verification to be processed. 6. Start trading!

AboutUs.text1: Not on distant islands in tax havens, but in the heart of Europe, the first crypto exchange was established in Prague, which has a full license to hold and trade cryptocurrencies.
AboutUs.text2: All activity is fully subject to EU laws and the supervision of regulators and authorities. Here you can buy crypto for fiat, hold it and trade it on one of the most modern platforms with an emphasis on completeness and simplicity

elements.text1: A key element of our platform is the comprehensiveness of services
elements.text2: In one place you can buy crypto for fiat currency through your debit card or by transfer from your account, you can then hold it here and trade it.
elements.text3: You can find spot trading here, but also Futures
elements.text4: You will be able to use our professional trading DCA, GRID, Futures Boots with artificial intelligence for trades
elements.text5: You can earn on the exchange by staking the most popular coins
elements.text6: Our exchange will also offer its own NFT platform, including a market place
elements.text7: You can also exchange coins on the exchange using the P2P principle
elements.text8: All these functions will be supplemented with educational programs and videos

financialWorld.text1: We want cryptocurrencies to become a common and respected part of the financial world in Europe.
financialWorld.text2: We want to contribute to the adoption of cryptocurrencies in Europe and offer a completely transparent and safe environment that is in line with EU law and regulations.
financialWorld.text3: So that people know what they can expect from the crypto world and are aware of the benefits, but also the risks of this industry. So that they know that investing in crypto is not just a short-term speculation, but a long-term and meaningful investment.
financialWorld.text4: Our vision is based on four basic values: transparency, comprehensiveness, security and simplicity. If we achieve the fulfillment of these values in our vision, then we will be on the way to bring people long-term regular profit from the crypto world.
